edu.byu.rpg.systems

Class UpdateSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.ashley.core.EntitySystem
      • com.badlogic.ashley.systems.IteratingSystem
        • edu.byu.rpg.systems.UpdateSystem

  • public class UpdateSystem
extends com.badlogic.ashley.systems.IteratingSystem
    This system handles the game's core engine loop. When added to RpgGame.engine, it will process each entity's update logic by calling the update method on that entity.
    See Also:
    LibGDX Ashley Iterating Systems

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.badlogic.ashley.core.EntitySystem

        priority

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UpdateSystem()
      Automatically sets the priority to 0, meaning this system will be evaluated first on each update loop.

      • processEntity

        protected void processEntity(com.badlogic.ashley.core.Entity entity,
                             float deltaTime)
        Executes update logic on every entity that is registered with RpgGame.engine.
        Specified by:
        processEntity in class com.badlogic.ashley.systems.IteratingSystem
        Parameters:
        entity - A single entity to update. This is automatically passed by Engine.
        deltaTime - The time since the last frame.
